Mission.title: Our Mission
Mission.text: Promoting standards and achieving excellence in the online reputation management practice whilst promoting community engagement, corporate social responsibility and health and wellness.

Mission.title: Our Vision
Mission.text: SGI as the leading global award body for exquisite online business reputation and brand management.
